name: ImageJ filter frangivesselness
title: ImageJ filter frangivesselness
description: This plugin implements the filter frangivesselness operation
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Anjali Taneja, Benjamin Houghton (benjamin.houghton@axleinfo.com), Najib Ishaq (najib.ishaq@nih.gov)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: The collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: pattern
inputs.description: The filepattern for the input images

inputs.name: spacing
inputs.description: The physical distance between data points in the image, can vary for each dimension of the image. Single value or comma separated list of values

ui.title: inpDir
ui.description: The collection to be processed by this plugin

ui.title: pattern
ui.description: The filepattern for the input images

ui.title: spacing
ui.description: The physical distance between data points in the image, can vary for each dimension of the image. Single value or comma separated list of values
